resources.string: Switch Network mode while screen Off (Off, 2G/GSM only or your selected screen off mode).
Select the default mode on screen ON:\n%s
Select the default mode on screen Off:\n%s
Disconnect from current WiFi access point when screen if Off.
Turn off WiFi service when screen is Off.
WiFi will NOT disconnect/turn Off if the selected applications are running.
Mobile data will NOT switch / turn Off if the selected applications are running.
Disable data auto sync over mobile networks and WiFi when screen is Off.
Select the delay screen goes Off before changing mobile network state.
Select the delay screen goes Off before disabling auto synchronization.
Select the delay screen goes Off before changing WiFi state.
Turn off Bluetooth when screen is Off
Turn off NFC when screen is Off
Select the delay screen goes Off before changing NFC state.
Select the delay screen goes Off before changing Bluetooth state.
Do NOT change current mobile data state while WiFi AP tethering is enabled
Do NOT change current mobile data state when a Call is active
WiFi state will not change if one of the white-listed WiFi access points is connected
Turn off or Switch mobile network mode to screen Off mode when WiFi is connected.
Do NOT switch/turn off mobile data while the device is plugged to USB/AC
Do NOT disconnect/turn off WiFi while the device is plugged to USB/AC
Enable Data synchronization for a specific duration during screen Off.
Then keep data synchronization enabled for
Enable mobile data (higher network mode) for a specific duration during screen Off.
Keep mobile data (higher network mode) disabled for
Then keep mobile data (higher network mode) enabled for
Enable WiFi for a specific duration during screen Off.
Do NOT turn off synchronization while the device is plugged to USB/AC
Wait for screen unlock before turning ON services.
Prevent Data, Sync, GPS, WiFi, NFC and Bluetooth services from being enabled when you manually deactivate them
Smart network is NOT active! Make sure Xposed framework is installed, this module is enabled on Xposed installer then REBOOT.
Switch GPS mode when screen is Off
Select the delay screen goes Off before changing GPS state.
GPS status will NOT changes if the selected applications are running.
Bluetooth will NOT turn Off if the selected devices are paired.
Please enable Bluetooth to get the paired devices list.
A required permission was NOT granted!
